title: Permanent Makeup for the Lips, Eyes and Brows
headline: Learn how to apply permanent makeup to the eyebrows, lips and eyes like a professional in this free online course.
description: This free online cosmetics course teaches you how to apply permanent makeup like a professional beautician. We explain how to use various tools to provide these specialised treatments for the eyes, brows and lips and lay out the care guidelines designed to keep them safe. Both men and women are taking advantage of today’s permanent makeup techniques so sign up for this makeup tutorial to expand your cosmetic skills and grow your beauty business.
courseDescription:
Most people want to look and feel their best and cosmetics offer one way to do so. More and more consumers are following the trend of using permanent cosmetics. This makeup tutorial provides the skills required to apply permanent makeup professionally, either on yourself and your friends or for clients as part of a beauty salon. This cosmetics course is taught by Kristina Bagrova, a certified award-winning beautician.

We first explain the procedures and methods used to apply permanent makeup to the brows. Our video demonstrations show you how to prepare the face before treatments and describe the various instruments you will use to perform them. We establish the importance of hygiene in the beauty industry and explain how to disinfect the tools used to apply makeup. We then lay out each step of the procedure used to apply multiple passes and touch up powdered eyebrows.

Many people struggle to apply flawless permanent eyeliner so we go through the procedure carefully to provide you with this valuable cosmetic skill. The course then explains how to provide other popular services, including lip pigmentation and its outlining, contouring and filling in. We then provide a demonstration of the techniques used to apply permanent makeup to the eyes, brows and lips on a latex model to help you add this skill to your repertoire. This course is ideal for anyone who wishes to become a professional permanent makeup artist and also suits anyone curious about these increasingly popular cosmetic procedures. Sign up for this permanent makeup tutorial to make better beauty decisions for yourself or your clients.
